titles.title: Honoring the firefighters and other public servants who responded to the wildfires in south Georgia during the spring of 2007.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 11/15/2007--Introduced. Honors Georgia firefighters and all of those who fought to suppress and contain the destructive wildfires in south Georgia during the spring of 2007. Expresses sympathy to those who lost their homes and businesses. Pledges continued support for: (1) efforts to prevent, fight, and contain wildfires in the United States; and (2) the efforts of firefighters of Georgia and the United States to prevent fire related disasters.
